title: Blog|记录 GitHub & Hexo 博客搭建过程
content:
简介（Instroduction）Welcome! Today I’m going to share my experience of set up my own blog. Above all, you should get Hexo and a GitHub account prepared.欢迎！ 今天我将会分享我搭建个人博客的经历。首先，你需要准备好Hexo和一个GitHub账号。
准备（Equipment）注意事项（Notes）
Make sure that your input method is English
Replace “Username” and “Email” mentioned with your own “Username” and “Email” of your GitHub
Operate by Git Bash
确保使用英文输入法
将提及的”用户名“和”邮箱“替换为自己的GitHub账户名和邮箱
使用 Git Bash 操作

环境搭建（Environment Setup）At first, we need to set up a local operating environment. Hexo is based on Node.js, and during the process we also need to use npm which is installed while installing Node.js and Git. As a result, we should install Node.js and Git.
首先，我们需要搭建一个本地操作环境。Hexo基于Node.js，过程中我们还需要使用npm（Node.js 自带）和Git，因此我们需要安装 Node.js 和 Git。
The web address is as follows:
网站地址如下：

Hexo
Node.js
Git

Download Node.js and Git, install all of them, click “Next” always. After you finished, you can use the following command in turn to confirm whether you have installed them correctly and lean the version you installed:
下载Node.js 和 Git，安装，一路点击“下一步”。 安装完后依次输入以下指令以确认是否正确安装以及获悉安装的版本:
node -v
npm -v
git --version

连接GitHub（Connect GitHub）创建账户（Sign up an account）Sign up an account on GitHub with your Email. Choose ‘Free account’ and finish Email verification. Input following commands:
git config --global user.name "GitHub Username"
git config --global user.email "GitHub Email"

用你的邮箱在GitHub上创建账户。选择免费帐户并完成邮箱验证。输入以下指令：
git config --global user.name "GitHub 用户名"
git config --global user.email "GitHub 邮箱"



创建SSH密钥（Create a SSH key）Input ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "GitHub Email" and keep pressing  “Enter” 
输入 ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "GitHub 邮箱"  一路按”回车”键

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

title: Blog|Hexo更改Theme Aurora
content:
Welcome! We talked about my experience of set up my blog by using  Github and Hexo, and in this blog, I’ll show you how to change the theme of your blog. In this blog, the example theme is Aurora.
欢迎！上回我们讨论了我通过使用GitHub和Hexo搭建个人博客的经历，在这篇博客中，我将会向你展示如何更改你博客的主题。本篇博客使用Aurora主题作为范例。
